p: The global spatial autocorrelation of FMD cases from 2010 to 2016 in China is not clustered. The hotspots areas for FMD serotype A cases were Tibet and Xinjiang provinces in 2013 and 2014. The hotspots areas for FMD serotype O cases were Xinjiang province in 2010; Tibet and Xinjiang provinces in 2011; and Tibet, Xinjiang and Qinghai provinces in 2013. The distribution of FMD cases from 2010 to 2016 showed a significant directional trend (northwest-southeast).
